headline.main: Texts of Day's War Communiques; British

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 31 (UP)--A communique of the Air and Home Security Ministries today said: Enemy aircraft dropped a few bombs in Southeast and Southwest England and South Wales last night. Reports indicate that little damage was done and that there were no casualties.
